title: UFC 244: How to watch Masvidal vs. Diaz 'BMF' title fight, full card, start time, streaming info
text:
For the fourth time in UFC history, the promotion makes its annual November stop at Madison Square Garden with UFC 244, one of the most anticipated events of the year that features an unprecedented title fight.

In the main event, Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz will throw down in a welterweight clash for the “BMF” title belt that is expected to be wrapped around the winner’s waist by Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson. And in the co-main event, former welterweight title challenger Darren Till makes his middleweight debut in a tough matchup with recent interim title challenger Kelvin Gastelum.

There’s that and much more on the stacked card. Take a look at the UFC 244 event info with lineup, start times, and key storylines below.

What: UFC 244

When: Saturday

Where: Madison Square Garden in New York

TV, Live stream: ESPN+, ESPN 2, pay-per-view

Full fight card, start times

MAIN CARD (Pay-per-view, 10 p.m. ET)

Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz

Kelvin Gastelum vs. Darren Till

Vicente Luque vs. Stephen Thompson

Blagoy Ivanov vs. Derrick Lewis

Gregor Gillespie vs. Kevin Lee

PRELIMINARY CARD (ESPN2, 8 p.m. ET)

Corey Anderson vs. Johnny Walker

Makwan Amirkhani vs. Shane Burgos

Edmen Shahbazyan vs. Brad Tavares

Andrei Arlovski vs. Jair Rozenstruik

PRELIMINARY CARD (ESPN2/ESPN+, 6:15 p.m. ET)

Katlyn Chookagian vs. Jennifer Maia

Lyman Good vs. Chance Rencountre

Julio Arce vs. Hakeem Dawodu

Key storylines
description: All the info you need to watch UFC 244, headlined by Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz for the "BMF" title.
